metadata.name: Adam's Dream
metadata.description:
From dances and songs, weary Adam.
He fell asleep, unwise, at the Tree of Knowledge.
The dazzling stars flutter above him,
The shadows of violet glide over the meadows,
And his sleepy spirit flies over the meadows,
and is suddenly overtaken by sinister dreams. He sees the flaming sword of angels,
That stings him and his friend mercilessly
And drives him out of paradise into the harsh blizzard,
Where they have nothing to cover their hips and shoulders...
–ù. Gumilev 

Paradise is like a distant dream ... In this picture I convey the experience of man that there was a paradise on Earth ... or maybe that we create our own hell or paradise ...

16000x7000 
oil on canvas
